question: Which Indian personality has been named as the state icon of Punjab by the Election Commission of India?
explanation:
Famous Actor Sonu Sood has been recently named as state icon of Punjab by the Election Commission of India (ECI).
The Election Commission has honoured the actor with the title, after he earned appreciation from across the country for his work to help the migrant labourers during the nation-wide lockdown. His auto-biography is also to be released with the title of "I Am No Messiah."
